eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class WauzPlayerSit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerSit

  • public class WauzPlayerSit
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for making players sit and stand up again.
    Author:
    Eddshine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WauzPlayerSit() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean canSitDown(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean showMessages)
      Checks if a player can sit down.
      static void sit(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Makes the player sit down at their current location, by spawning an arrow to sit on.
      static void sit(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Makes the player sit down on the given STAIRS block, by spawning an arrow to sit on.
      static void standUp(org.spigotmc.event.entity.EntityDismountEvent event)
      Lets the player stand up and makes the arrow they were sitting on despawn.

    • Method Detail

      • canSitDown

        public static boolean canSitDown(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                 boolean showMessages)
        Checks if a player can sit down.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to sit.
        showMessages - If info messages should be shown to the player.
        Returns:
        If sitting is possible.

      • sit

        public static void sit(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Makes the player sit down at their current location, by spawning an arrow to sit on.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should sit down.
        See Also:
        canSitDown(Player, boolean)

      • sit

        public static void sit(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Makes the player sit down on the given STAIRS block, by spawning an arrow to sit on.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should sit down.
        block - The block to sit on.
        See Also:
        canSitDown(Player, boolean)

      • standUp

        public static void standUp(org.spigotmc.event.entity.EntityDismountEvent event)
        Lets the player stand up and makes the arrow they were sitting on despawn.
        Parameters:
        event - The dismount event.
